enhanced_by.reason: The hasOption method checks if an option has been added to the command line. The addOption method is responsible for adding options, making it a prerequisite for hasOption.
Both hasOption and getOptionValue methods deal with the presence and retrieval of option values, making assertions about the output of hasOption more informed by the behavior of getOptionValue.
The getOptionProperties method retrieves properties associated with an option, which can be used to assert the presence and properties of options checked by hasOption.
